name: VIP Shuttle
description: The VIP Shuttle Experience is a free virtual reality experience in a futuristic environment. Complete your mission to get to your meeting on time by reaching the VIP Shuttle. You face numerous challenges and in the end you have to prove how courageous you really are ...
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5 Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 Storage: 5 MB available space
